plot: A shy, nerdy man, Takeru finds a schoolgirl hooker Lily is unconscious in a Tokyo park, so he decides to bring her home and lock her up in a secret basement. Although Lily is afraid of him,...
title: Kanzen-naru shiiku: Himitsu no chika-shitsu
